Package gameplay

Class Dice

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameplay.Dice

  • public class Dice
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulates a pair of dice. The dice will be rolled during the game. Each die can randomly roll a number between 1 and 6. Their result will be added.
    Author:
    Panos

      • Dice

        public Dice​()

    • Method Detail

      • rollDice

        public void rollDice​()
        Rolls both dice.

      • getDie1

        public int getDie1​()
        Returns:
        int The number that was rolled for the first die. Possible values are numbers between 1 and 6.

      • getDie2

        public int getDie2​()
        Returns:
        int The number that was rolled for the second die. Possible values are numbers between 1 and 6.

      • getDiceTotal

        public int getDiceTotal​()
        Returns:
        int Returns the sum of both dice. Possible values are numbers between 2 and 12.
